list_definition.definition: (the prosperity gained by) the achievement of an aim or purpose

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has achieved great success as an actor / in his career.

list_definition.mean_english: người hoặc cái gì thành công
list_definition.definition: a person or thing that succeeds or prospers

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She’s a great success as a teacher.
